### 语雀 + netlify #### 1. netlify 配置 前往 Settings -> Build & Deploy 找到 Build hooks，添加一个 build hook ![深度截图_选择区域_20190118045105.png](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/123526/1547758312860-04ae851b-7573-4b67-a161-33e62fd8aa4d.png#align=left&display=inline&height=330&name=%E6%B7%B1%E5%BA%A6%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE_%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%E5%8C%BA%E5%9F%9F_20190118045105.png&originHeight=523&originWidth=1181&size=32733&status=done&width=746) #### 2. 语雀配置 URL 填入刚刚从 netlify 生成的 hook 链接 ![深度截图_选择区域_20190118050115.png](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/123526/1547758904666-06dc5d0f-c45e-4fa9-8616-c79f55ed1c15.png#align=left&display=inline&height=283&name=%E6%B7%B1%E5%BA%A6%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE_%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%E5%8C%BA%E5%9F%9F_20190118050115.png&originHeight=508&originWidth=1341&size=57865&status=done&width=746) > - 所有更新触发：该知识库下的任何一篇文档的更新都会触发 WebHook > - 仅主动推送更新触发：只在文档发布或更新的时候勾选了「文档有较大更新，推送给关注人」才会触发 WebHook ![1545304800706-d7cc1fd0-bbc6-4e3d-b8ec-88773f558a4b.png](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2019/png/123526/1547759387222-a374e7cd-69dc-4cb6-9433-dad75898b191.png#align=left&display=inline&height=217&name=1545304800706-d7cc1fd0-bbc6-4e3d-b8ec-88773f558a4b.png&originHeight=458&originWidth=784&size=51099&status=done&width=372) #### 3. 同步语雀文章 Gatsby -> [https://github.com/Raincal/gatsby-source-yuque](https://github.com/Raincal/gatsby-source-yuque)
VuePress -> [https://github.com/ulivz/vuepress-plugin-yuque](https://github.com/ulivz/vuepress-plugin-yuque)
Hexo -> [https://github.com/x-cold/yuque-hexo](https://github.com/x-cold/yuque-hexo) 完成上面三步后，就可以尝试发布新文章啦！
